verses.roman:
gṛhera bhitare prabhu karuna gamana
dui bhāi āilā tabe karite bhojana

synonyms: gṛhera bhitare—within the room; prabhu—Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karuna—kindly do; gamana—entering; dui bhāi—the two brothers, Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Nityānanda Prabhu; āilā—came; tabe—then; karite bhojana—to partake of the prasāda.
translation: Śrī Advaita Prabhu said, "My dear Lords, kindly enter this room." The two brothers, Caitanya Mahāprabhu and Nityānanda Prabhu, then came forward to take the prasāda.
